text: @kylewalker2 @KevinORourke16 @ginnyr9 sure isn't that the 2nd time this lad has flouted the Covid19 rules, are we meant to be sympathetic?? I'm sure everyone in the country would love to hug their family but I guess this is just another example of an overpaid, out of touch footballer
